'Thomas "Tom" Cat' is a fictional character and one of the two protagonists in
Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer's series of Tom and Jerry theatrical cartoon short films.
Created by William Hanna and Joseph Barbera, Tom is a blue/grey anthropomorphic
domestic short-haired cat who first appeared in the 1940 animated short [[Puss
Gets the Boot]]. Tom was originally known as "Jasper" during his
debut in that short, however, beginning from his next appearance in
[[The Midnight Snack]] and onwards, he is known as "Tom" or "Thomas".
